data.text:
İ f you just need a bed to sleep in,it is enough, and you are not fussy, then it May be ok.
But there are serious barbecue oders comıng ınto the rooms, which doesnnot enable you to OPEn Windows, also very dark lighting in certain rooms.
The maın reception phone not operatıng in room, also no heating in bathroom.
No lifts to floors, hv to carry your own luggage.
The only good point location, perfect.
I think upgrading could work.
data.title: Ok for öne night, otherwise wld like a little more amenities.

data.text:
Location is wonderful, by sea side
Loads of restaurants and cafes around
Easy to walk to many locations 
Hotel concept is bohemian and sweet, but shower is leaking, room wasn’t clean, full of hair and cigarette ashes (we don’t smoke), electric sockets and night lamps are falling apart. Hotel requires some serious refurbishment. 
Generally it is a nice place with some cons that could be fixed easily. If management takes comments into consideration, it would be a great hotel to stay at
data.title: Sweet but not clean
